data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marques, Dayse W. A., Rafael, José A. (2016): Latheticomyia Wheeler (Diptera: Pseudopomyzidae) from Peru: new species, description of the male of L. longiterebra Hennig and a key to species. Zootaxa 4093 (3): 424-434, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.3.8|3 occurrences
